title: Issue when importing both retro (from OpenAI) and torch
body_html:
Issue description:

Crash when importing both retro and torch, order doesn't matter

Code example:

import retro
import torch

I then get the windows pop-up saying python has stopped working

  • PyTorch or Caffe2: PyTorch
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): Conda
  • OS: Windows 10
  • PyTorch version: 0.4.0
  • Python version: 3.6.4
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: 9.0
  • GPU models and configuration: Nvidia GTX 760

body:
**Issue description:**

Crash when importing both retro and torch, order doesn't matter

**Code example:**

import retro
import torch

I then get the windows pop-up saying python has stopped working

- PyTorch or Caffe2: PyTorch
- How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): Conda
- OS: Windows 10
- PyTorch version: 0.4.0
- Python version: 3.6.4
- CUDA/cuDNN version: 9.0
- GPU models and configuration: Nvidia GTX 760
